text: A woman has died after being hit by a car that fled the scene in Queens, and now, the driver is facing manslaughter charges. Witnesses say 59 - year - old Raj Chohan was leaving her car on 117th Street in South Richmond Hill Friday when she was hit by a silver Toyota Camry and sent flying into the air. She died at the hospital. Police caught up with the driver, who is from Schnectady, a few blocks away. He has been charged with vehicular manslaughter, negligent homicide and fleeing the scene of an accident.
title: Woman Killed In Queens Hit - And - Run, Driver Charged.
